parameters:
Are you guys going to the mine? Then come over to this
Bonfire. Your HP and MP will be fully restored!

Oh, thanks a lot! Girls!! I can't really thank you properly
though! Haha!
...That was a lie! Bring this person here...!

Oh, thanks a lot! Girls!! As expected, there's nothing left
to do! Haha!

I can't work anymore... Well... I can take a break, so it
doesn't matter either way...

So, if the kidnapper has been caught.... does that mean I
have to work...?

Damn it, what the hell happened?! Those damn guys with kids
kicked me out! I got punched too... It hurts...

I heard there's no workers' compensation... Should I quit
this job?
